text: Timothy Michael Dolan (born February 6, 1950) is an American cardinal of the Catholic Church. He has served as the tenth and current Archbishop of New York since 2009. Dolan was the President of the United States Conference of Catholic Bishops from 2010 to 2013. Dolan is widely known for his conservative views. He was Archbishop of Milwaukee from 2002 to 2009 and Auxiliary Bishop of St. Louis from 2001 to 2002. Dolan was born in St. Louis, Missouri. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:American cardinals Category:American theologians Category:Writers from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Writers from Milwaukee Category:Writers from New York City
title: Timothy M. Dolan
